form.page_subtitle: CWC Counselling: Reduce Fever At Home > Reduce Fever At Home 1

field.name: Feel your child’s body to see if he or she feels hot. If so, your child might have malaria. Malaria kills, so treat it immediately
Sponge your child with water at room temperature (lukewarm), give paracetamol if available according to child’s age
See a health worker or a trained community health volunteer immediately for treatment
Give full treatment of artesunate amodiaquine or other medicines as instructed by health workers
